attributes.action: regulate estate agents and prevent manipulation of house prices by these responsible-to-no-one middlemen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Estate agents currently have no regulation.  They are free to manipulate house prices to their own ends.  Much of the over inflation of house prices in the last 10 years has been down to estate agent collusion and profiteering.  In most other industries, this would be illegal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
